title: Amillion Bangboo
name: amillion
bio: A million Dennies in one Bangboo.

skills.name: Portable Machine Gun - Debt-Clearer
skills.desc: Active Skill Builds a machine gun and continuously shoots enemies, dealing massive Physical DMG.

skills.name: Portable Machine Gun - Gatling Debt-Clearer
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Uses machine guns and cannons to continuously attack the target, dealing massive Physical DMG.

title: Bagboo Bangboo
name: bagboo
bio: There's a dark past hidden under that bag...

skills.name: Closer, Closer...
skills.desc: Active Skill Unleashes a series of slashes with dual blades, dealing Physical DMG.

skills.name: Swiftly Honed
skills.desc: Increases Max HP of all Agents by 3%.

skills.name: That's Close Enough!
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Continually slashes the target, dealing massive Physical DMG.

title: Luckyboo Bangboo
name: luckyboo
bio: Takes up quite a bit of space when placed on the counter.

skills.name: Lavish Spending
skills.desc: Luckyboo bombards the target and surrounding enemies, dealing Physical damage.

skills.name: Luck is a Component of Power
skills.desc: Increases CRIT Rate of all Agents by 4%.

skills.name: Ether Aptitude Enhance
skills.desc: Boosts the Max HP/ATK/DEF of Agents in battle by 16%/8%/16% of the Bangboo's Max HP/ATK/DEF.

skills.name: Finishing Move - Rock Crusher
skills.desc: Active Skill Jumps towards the target and executes a downward strike, dealing Physical DMG in an area. This skill is good at interrupting.

skills.name: Overpower All Odds
skills.desc: Increases damage of all Physical Attribute Agents by 6%.

skills.name: Ether Aptitude Enhance
skills.desc: Boosts the Max HP/ATK/DEF of Agents in battle by 16%/8%/16% of the Bangboo's Max HP/ATK/DEF.

title: Paperboo Bangboo
name: paperboo
bio: Always nostalgic over when it hatched from its shell.

skills.name: Decoy Paper Armor
skills.desc: Active Skill Uses a cardboard box to camouflage itself, inducing a taunt effect: While camouflaged, being attacked by enemies or reaching the camouflage time limit will trigger an explosion, dealing Physical DMG in an area.

skills.name: Cardboard Armor
skills.desc: Increases ATK of all Agents by 5%.

skills.name: Paper Armor: Impact Mode
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Enters a cardboard box and jumps at the target enemy, causing an explosion when it lands, dealing Physical DMG over a large area.

title: Sharkboo Bangboo
name: sharkboo
bio: Seen in the distant seas and the seafood section of the fresh food market.

skills.name: Drylands Shark Hunt
skills.desc: Active Skill Plants a homing trap underfoot which bites, tears, and summons torpedos at triggering enemies, dealing Ice DMG and accumulating Ice Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Relentless Pursuit
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Summons a homing trap and leaps toward the target, causing an explosion upon landing that deals Ice DMG and accumulates massive Ice Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Boring Burst
skills.desc: Active Skill Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a drilling attack upon hit and dealing Physical DMG.

skills.name: Demolition Drill
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a multi-hit drilling attack upon hit and dealing massive Physical DMG.

title: Exploreboo Bangboo
name: exploreboo
bio: Beep-beep-beep-beep. Does that mean there treasure or that it's running outta battery?

skills.name: Modded Ether Detector
skills.desc: Active Skill: Strikes the target with a barrage of golden coins, dealing Physical DMG and accumulating Physical Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Ether Detection Specialist
skills.desc: Increases DEF of all Agents by 5%.

skills.name: Ether Aptitude Enhance
skills.desc: Boosts the Max HP/ATK/DEF of Agents in battle by 16%/8%/16% of the Bangboo's Max HP/ATK/DEF.

title: Devilboo Bangboo
name: devilboo
bio: The only thing more tempting than a devil... is Devilboo!

skills.name: Kiss of Temptation
skills.desc: Active Skill Enters the flying state, shooting homing bullets at enemies to deal Ether DMG and inflict Ether Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Kiss of Confusion
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack: Fires lasers at the target and then enters the coordination state. Under this state, fires homing bullets in coordination with the on-field character's attacks, dealing Ether DMG and accumulating Ether Anomaly Buildup for up to 30s or 10 activations.

skills.name: Tea Break
skills.desc: Butler creates a heartfelt afternoon snack. The snack will generate 40 Energy for the receiving Agent, and apply an 8% ATK buff based on own stats.

skills.name: Personal Butler
skills.desc: Increases CRIT Rate of all Agents by 14%, and the CRIT Rate of Victoria Housekeeping Co. Agents by an extra 14%.

skills.name: Ether Aptitude Enhance
skills.desc: Boosts the Max HP/ATK/DEF of Agents in battle by 16%/8%/16% of the Bangboo's Max HP/ATK/DEF.

title: Cryboo Bangboo
name: cryboo
bio: Who knows what troubles plague a young Bangboo?

skills.name: Pull-Tab Bomb
skills.desc: Active Skill Throws a bomb at the target, dealing Fire DMG and accumulating Fire Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Shocking Gift
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Throws a bomb at the target, dealing Fire DMG and inflicting massive Fire Anomaly Buildup.

title: Avocaboo Bangboo
name: avocaboo
bio: Who knows what troubles plague a young Bangboo?

skills.name: Sweet and Juicy
skills.desc: Active Skill Shoots juice bullets at the character currently on the battlefield. If the bullet misses, the juice will remain on the ground for a while. Characters coming into contact with the juice will recover HP. The recovery effect can only trigger up to 15 times per combat.

skills.name: Straight in the Heart
skills.desc: Active Skill Shoots juice bullets at the character currently on the battlefield. If the bullet misses, the juice will remain on the ground for a while. Characters coming into contact with the juice will recover HP. The recovery effect can only trigger up to 15 times per combat.

skills.name: Dart of Desperation
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Launches itself with a slingshot, flying towards the target and performing consecutive slashes, dealing massive Physical DMG.

title: Electroboo Bangboo
name: electroboo
bio: Bzzzt... Please wear insulated gloves when petting.

skills.name: Maximum Voltage!
skills.desc: Active Skill Charges the enemy and continuously electrocutes the target, dealing Electric DMG and accumulating Electric Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Billion Volt Thunderbolt!
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Continually electrocutes the target, dealing Electric DMG and inflicting massive Electric Anomaly Buildup.

title: Booressure Bangboo
name: booressure
bio: Understanding the mood of a conversation is key to becoming a Bangboo social expert.

skills.name: Ether Bubble
skills.desc: Active Skill Releases Ether bubbles that generate Energy for characters coming into contact with them.

title: Rocketboo Bangboo
name: rocketboo
bio: This Bangboo accelerates for 17.5 steps when running a hundred kilometers.

skills.name: Boom!
skills.desc: Active Skill Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing Fire DMG to enemies within range and accumulating Fire Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Ka-Boom Express Shipping
skills.desc: Bangboo Chain Attack Mounts a rocket and charges at the target. Upon hitting a target, the rocket will explode, dealing Fire DMG to enemies in a large area and inflicting massive Fire Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Mini-Black Hole
skills.desc: Summon an Ether black hole that continuously pulls in enemies and deals Ether DMG to enemies struck and accumulated Ether Attribute Anomaly Buildup.

skills.name: Primordial Black Hole
skills.desc: Throws an Ether bomb at the target, dealing Ether DMG and accumulating massive Ether Attribute Anomaly Buildup.
